snippet: It is one of the last great equalizing institutions. No V.I.P. treatment here.
abstract: Ethan Hauser Loose Ends column shares his somewhat inexplicable affection for the big-city post office, which he sees as one of the last great equalizing institutions in its egalitarian doling out of dysfunction, grime and hope-crushing chaos.
